message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be a great asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $18000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your generosity, but my budget allows me to only spend up to $15000 on this product. I would like to make a counteroffer at $15000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $15000 is a bit too low for me at this point.  I'm willing to come down to $16500. This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer at $16000. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
